name: charextra
description: Extra chars for Node.js and Typescript

scripts.test: tsc -outdir ./build/ test.ts && tsc -d index.ts && copy index.js .\build && copy /a index.d.ts .\build && echo ------------------------------ && node build\test.js
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run test
